page.title: 15SATURDAY
page.content:
I wake to find a drink of pure orange on my table. After washing I get dressed into my Liverpool kit and watch the television{(Recreation)} while I have my breakfast. When I have finished breakfast I go out and call for my friends and we go to play football. We play football until we realise we have booked the squash courts so we go home to get ready. Four of us play until lunch. After lunch my dad takes my friends and I swimming to Plas Madoc swimming baths. We have a great time.
After tea my friends and I play on my computer. When they have gone home I watch television. My favourite programmes are No. 73, Hunter, and Murder She Wrote. I then play on my computer again until supper. After a hot drink and a biscuit I go to bed.
